name: copilot-autotester
description: Interactive feedback panel for GitHub Copilot with image support. Enables human-in-the-loop workflows for AI agents via MCP.

autotester.toolName.description: The name of the MCP tool exposed to the agent.

autotester.toolDescription.default: Run after implementing features/fixes. Opens feedback panel with your description.
autotester.toolDescription.description: The description of the MCP tool shown to the agent.

autotester.footer.default:
---
⚠️ IMPORTANT: Always reply back via the autotester MCP tool after implementing changes. Continue the feedback loop until you receive a signal that all work is done.
autotester.footer.description: Footer message appended to all feedback responses.

autotester.enterToSubmit.description: Submit feedback when pressing Enter (without modifiers). Shift+Enter always creates a new line.

autotester.ctrlEnterToSubmit.description: Submit feedback when pressing Ctrl+Enter (or Cmd+Enter on Mac).
